properties.areaDesc: Lake Michigan from Sturgeon Bay to Two Rivers WI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Seul Choix Point to Rock Island Passage 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Pentwater to Manistee MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Point Betsie to Manistee MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Two Rivers to Sheboygan WI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan South of a line from Seul Choix Point to the Mackinac Bridge and North of a line from Charlevoix MI to South Fox Island 5NM offshore; Lake Michigan from Charlevoix to Point Betsie MI 5NM Offshore to mid lake; Lake Michigan from Rock Island Passage to Sturgeon Bay WI 5NM offshore to mid lake
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 5 at 9:02AM CST until January 6 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
...STRONG WINDS EXPECTED TODAY INTO TONIGHT ACROSS LAKE
MICHIGAN...

* WHAT...South winds gusting to 30 knots with occasional gusts to
35 knots this morning, turning to the west to southwest this
afternoon with gusts of 35 to 40 knots. Waves building to 7 to
10 feet, occasional to 13 feet.

* WHERE...Northern Open Waters of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...From noon Today to 2 AM CST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 2 AM CST MONDAY
